body:
Hi,
I am installing `p4est` with spack on `redhat`. However, the configuration phase fails with this log

```
==> './configure' '--prefix=/pica/h1/alid/spack/opt/spack/linux-redhat6-x86_64/gcc-6.2.0/p4est-1.1-433ez53cipndb6fqajpvyok5poaqkzqm' '--enable-mpi' '--enable-shared' '--disable-vtk-binary' '--without-blas' 'CPPFLAGS=-DSC_LOG_PRIORITY=SC_LP_ESSENTIAL' 'CFLAGS=-O2' 'CC=/opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpicc' 'CXX=/opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpic++' 'FC=/opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpif90' 'F77=/opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpif77'
checking for a BSD-compatible install... /usr/bin/install -c
checking whether build environment is sane... yes 
checking for a thread-safe mkdir -p... /bin/mkdir -p
checking for gawk... gawk
checking whether make sets $(MAKE)... yes 
checking whether make supports nested variables... yes 
checking whether make supports nested variables... (cached) yes 
checking for a sed that does not truncate output... /bin/sed
checking Major version... 1
checking Minor version... 1

o---------------------------------------
| Checking options
o---------------------------------------
o---------------------------------------
| Checking MPI and related programs
o---------------------------------------
checking whether we are using MPI... yes 
checking whether we are using MPI I/O... yes 
checking whether we are using MPI_Init_thread... yes 
checking for mpiexec... mpiexec
configure:                             F77 set to /opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpif77
configure:                              FC set to /opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpif90
configure:                              CC set to /opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpicc
configure:                             CXX set to /opt/openmpi/2.0.1gcc6.2.0/bin/mpic++
checking whether the Fortran 77 compiler works... yes 
checking for Fortran 77 compiler default output file name... a.out
checking for suffix of executables... 
checking whether we are cross compiling... configure: error: in `/home/alid/spack/var/spack/stage/p4est-1.1-433ez53cipndb6fqajpvyok5poaqkzqm/p4est-1.1':
configure: error: cannot run Fortran 77 compiled programs.
If you meant to cross compile, use `--host'.
See `config.log' for more details
```

If I run the same configuration directly in the staged folder it doesn't fail.

Has anyone encountered this issue before?
title: p4est fails to configure with external Openmpi
